ygData.subject: Re: Financial Aid
ygData.msgSnippet: I m on Innoruuk also...but I ve lost 7 to 8 plats to bugs so far and I havent been doing that great with loot...I just got the enchant silver spell and the
ygData.messageBody:
I'm on Innoruuk also...but I've lost 7 to 8 plats to bugs so far and I
havent been doing that great with loot...I just got the enchant silver spell
and the jewelry kit...but now I'm broke...cant help much right now...If you
come to Freeport and need the enchant silver spell from Neriak, I'll give
you a hand to get it.
Skara

-----Original Message-----
From: Randy Jackson [mailto:bullsfn@...]
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 2:08 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Financial Aid


From: Randy Jackson <bullsfn@...>

Hello, I am a fellow enchanter and I am looking for a favor. I play
Qumen an 8th level High Elf Enchanter on the Innoruuk server. What I am
looking for is for someone to help finance my selected trade of jewel
craft. I have a skill of 25 and have run into one small stumbling block,
cash flow. If someone is willing to help with financing I would be
willing to share magic items, profits, or any other arrangement that we
can agree upon. Wouldn't it be neat to start a trade guild to help
newbie jewelers with this problem. I am sure I am not the first with
this experience.
